)

func main() {
	pulumi.Run(func(ctx *pulumi.Context) error {
		_, err := Vpn.GetConnections(ctx, &vpn.GetConnectionsArgs{

			Name:              pulumi.StringRef("main"),

			},
			VpcId:        pulumi.StringRef("cgw-xfqag"),
			VpnGatewayId: pulumi.StringRef("vpngw-8ccsnclt"),

		}
		return nil

}
